text:
PriceLabs | Full-stack developer | Chicago, IL | ONSITE | 70k-95k

PriceLabs is a Revenue Management service for vacation and short-term rental industry. We're a fast growing software-as-a-service used by thousands of customers around the world, and are looking for someone who can contribute in a meaningful way towards building and scaling our product.

You'd be one of the first engineers, working on our product to take it to next level. The full job description is at https://angel.co/pricelabs-co/jobs/345833-software-engineer-...

Our stack: Ruby, Python, MySQL, Linux

Any questions? Email me founders@pricelabs.co
